ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: Apple is looking for a highly motivated product design engineer to join the Soft Goods Product Design group. You will be part of a cross-functional design team responsible for conceiving, designing and producing exciting new products. You will work closely with many different groups, including Industrial Design, Hardware Engineering, Operations, Packaging, Safety, Thermal, EMC, and Software.

ul.li: •Strong 3D and 2D CAD skills (NX, Solidworks or ProE/Creo preferred)
•Experience in production part design utilizing a variety of engineering materials (metals, sheet metal, plastics)
•Strong engineering fundamentals (beam bending, free body diagrams, GD&T, etc...)
•Experience using spreadsheets to analyze engineering data
•Knowledge of soft goods materials (synthetics, leather, adhesives)
•Knowledge of softgoods assembly process (cut and stitch and cut and stick
•Strong understanding of thermodynamics and heat transfer

div.p: You will be part of a team that takes products from concept to mass production. This role will require travel to our global supply base.
•BS in Mechanical Engineering required, MS Preferred.
